narrative: Reviewed main branch llms.txt updates and explored cached datasets with jgtpy and jgtml CLI tools. Updated timeline and AGENTS guidelines to note data exploration steps and official documentation links.
user_input:
look the main branch, it has new information in the llms.txt and if you look at commits etc....

also, explore the ./data/current and ./data/full which you have tools for jgtml to do that (these are data generated by the package jgtml and jgtpy using various commands)
scene: Before: documentation captured CLI verification but lacked dataset exploration guidance. After: timeline notes data directory checks, AGENTS instruct referencing llms.txt and exploring cached data for offline analysis.
